mapper.select: select product.*,pt.`name` AS typeName,ex.plate from product JOIN product_type pt on pt.id = product.product_type_id JOIN user_product_select as ps on product.short_code = ps.product_short_code JOIN exchange_info as ex on product.exchange_id=ex.id where NOW() > product.expiration_begin_time and product.expiration_time >= NOW() and product.status in (1,2) and ps.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY product.sort_num

delete from user_product_select where user_id = #{userId} and id in
